title: cant move/see/see chat/ buy items/ or gold going up. please
body: so when I am in a game I load in fine my ping is fine it jumps alittle but when it does it goes back down. when my ping is normal is when I have these problems to where I cant see me casting my abilities, cant see passive gold going up, cant see me buying items, and cant see chat but they can see what I type. I have run the repair tool many times. restarted my router to my net. I don't know what else to do someone please help because I don't want a ban

replies.body:
There could be a configuration corruption here.  See if resetting your config helps:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
